list.name: CSS
list.description: CSS is the technology for designing web pages

list.name: Golang
list.description: Go is a statically typed, compiled high-level programming language designed at Google by Robert Griesemer, Rob Pike, and Ken Thompson. It is syntactically similar to C, but with memory safety, garbage collection, structural typing, and CSP-style concurrency.

list.name: Glossary
list.description: Get familiar with common technical terms

list.name: HTML
list.description: HTML is the markup of language for defining the structure of web pages
